channel.title: Kevin Putschko, ExploreR
channel.description: Recent content on Kevin Putschko, ExploreR

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Kevin Putschko. I’m a consulting data scientist with Experis in Kalamazoo, MI. I’m proficient in R and all things tidyverse.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Stay tuned! This is the first post of my blog! Here I will discuss my adventures into the world of Data Science and R.
